howto.title: How to Use Bad Translator
howto.description: Follow these simple steps to turn your text into funny translations with Bad Translator from VibeTrans.

steps.title: Enter Your Text
steps.description: Paste or type the text you want to translate into the text box.

items.title: Google's Epic Mistranslation
items.fact: Did you know? In 2015, Google Translate mistakenly translated 'Russian Federation' to 'Mordor.' Now that's a translation fail worthy of a meme! I love how these mistakes create such a unique sense of humor.

items.title: Beat Around the Bush Fail
items.fact: Ever heard the phrase 'beat around the bush'? It got hilariously mistranslated in Chinese to mean 'defeating the bush'. Classic mistranslation moment. I think it's amazing how these errors make language so much fun!

sections.title: How Accurate is Bad Translator?

item-1.question: Is Bad Translator free to use?
item-1.answer: Yes, Bad Translator is completely free! You can use it to create funny, absurd translations without any cost. Enjoy all the features without worrying about hidden fees.

item-2.question: How does Bad Translator work?
item-2.answer: Bad Translator works by taking your text, translating it through multiple languages, and producing funny, sometimes absurd, translations. Simply input your text and choose your language pair to get started.

item-3.question: Is my data safe with Bad Translator?
item-3.answer: Yes, your data is secure. We don't store any of your inputted text, and your translations are private. VibeTrans ensures your privacy while using Bad Translator.

item-4.question: How many languages does Bad Translator support?
item-4.answer: Bad Translator supports a variety of languages, and you can experiment with different language combinations. The more languages you try, the more hilarious results you get!

item-5.question: Can I use Bad Translator for business purposes?
item-5.answer: Absolutely! Bad Translator can be used to generate fun content for marketing campaigns, social media posts, or even creative brainstorming sessions. It's perfect for adding humor to your business content.

item-6.question: Can I download my translations?
item-6.answer: Yes, you can easily download the translations as a text file. Perfect for saving and sharing with friends, colleagues, or posting on social media!

item-7.question: How many translation rounds should I use?
item-7.answer: The number of rounds affects how absurd your translation gets. For mild humor, try 5-7 rounds. For maximum chaos, go for 15-20 rounds! Experiment to find your perfect level of weirdness.

item-8.question: Can I save my favorite translations?
item-8.answer: Yes! You can download any translation as a text file, copy it to your clipboard, or share it directly on social media. All your hilarious results are just a click away!
